name: Red Race Car
details: This sleek red race car toy is perfect for little speedsters. It features a streamlined design, realistic engine sounds, and working headlights. The car is made of durable plastic and is suitable for children aged 3 and above.

name: Monster Truck
details: Get ready for some high-octane fun with this monster truck toy! It features large wheels, a rugged design, and a powerful pull-back motor. Kids will love performing stunts and races with this exciting toy.

name: Police Car
details: This police car toy is perfect for young heroes. It has flashing lights, realistic siren sounds, and removable police accessories. The car is made of durable plastic and is suitable for children aged 3 and above.

name: Convertible Roadster
details: Cruise in style with this sleek convertible roadster toy. It features a removable soft-top roof, shiny metallic paint, and realistic engine sounds. The car is made of high-quality materials and is suitable for children aged 4 and above.

name: Off-Road Jeep
details: Take on rough terrains with this off-road jeep toy. It features large rubber tires, a rugged design, and a pull-back motor. The jeep is made of durable plastic and is suitable for children aged 5 and above.

name: Fire Engine Truck
details: Sound the alarm! This fire engine truck toy is perfect for aspiring firefighters. It features flashing lights, realistic siren sounds, and movable parts. The truck is made of sturdy plastic and is suitable for children aged 3 and above.
